fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Target player at night.
- Targeted player's ability is delayed by one night. They retain their original targets if possible. If you delaying their ability causes it to fail somehow (ie: It's no longer full moon so they can't use a certain ability), you're informed.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Delayed players can still make another action the night they perform their delayed ability.
- Delayed players aren't told they're being delayed.
